chanda polata yamedi thama jathika handunum patha, walangu widesha gaman balapathraya, riyaduru balapathraya,rajya wishramika handunumpatha, wadihiti handunumpatha, pudgalayin liyapadinchi kirime departhamenthuwa nikuth kala pujya pakshaya sandahawu handunum patha, mathiwarana departhamenthuwa nikuth kara thibena wishesha handunumpatha yana handunum pathwalin ekak ragena yayuthu yayi pawasiya.chanda poledi chandadayakayage nama liyapadinchi wi thibunath mathiwarana departhamenthuwa danwa athi paridi handunum pathak idiripath kota thama ananyathawaya oppu kirimata chandadayakaya asamathwuwahoth ee pudgalayata chanda pathrikawak nikuth kirimata niladharinta nohakiwe.emenma chandadayakaya thama niwasata labunu nila chanda danwim pathrikawa chanda polata ragena yamen ema sthanaye sitina niladharinta rajakari kirimata pahasuwena bawa ee mahatha penwadeyi.chandaya bhawitha kirimen pasuwa chandadayakayinta chanda pola awata gawasenna epa yayi pawasana ee mahatha ranchu gasi sitina aya iwath kirimata polisiyata upades dun bawa prakasha ෙkaleya.

hisathel game mahothsawaya 2013 hisathel gama 2013 nawa wasarata subha pathum subha pathum paniwudaya dharmachakra pujawa katharagama dharmachakra pujawa wishesha dharma deshanawak banak juli 04 bhawana wadasatahana mayi 19 ude 6.00 sita sawasa 5.00 wanatharu widarshana bhawanawa saha abhidharma padama pokunuwita shri winayalankararamadhipathiwa wada wisu shri lanka shwejin maha nikaye maha nayaka padawiya hebawu, sahithya chakrawarthi, panditha, mahacharya parama pujaniya rerukane chandawimala maha nayaka mahimipanan wahanse, uthum pawidi jiwithaya awurudu 91  k pamana gathakala siyawasak jiwath wu thripitaka dharmaya gana athi wishishta danumak athiwa itha usas manasika diyunuwak labagena silwath yamha dhamman wijaneyya - samma sambuddha desithan sakkachchan than namasseyya - aggihuththan wa brahmano budu rajanan wahanse wisin deshitha dahama yamakugen danagatha haki wuye nam gana dewiyan pudana bamuna se maha nahimiyange shasanika sewa atharin maha nahimiyange shasanika sewa atharin ihalinma kapi penenne lekhakayeku washayen kala udara sewayayi.
